The only non-terrible competitive shooter on the market, so by default the best one. If you're not too fond of the standard gameplay you can easily rack up a few hundred hours on community servers with custom gamemodes. It's also free, so just try it.

When you compare shooters to each other you first start by comparing every other shooter you have ever played to Counter Strike. There are no kill streak kits, no fancy weapon mechanics, not even sprinting. Only the best of the best climb in this arena and many have been playing this game in some form long before most people on the planet were even alive. If you can master this game you can master any FPS because no hand holding happens in dust. CS:GO improves upon the previous games by simply not changing a damn thing.
